summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DiffBond Analyzer - metallic sandwich structures strength calculation application. Backend APIs and frontend UI are working properly with minor issues.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns HTTP 200 instead of 201 for successful creation
minor_bugs.impact: Material is created successfully but wrong status code

minor_bugs.issue: UTS calculation validation may be too strict - values 49-118 MPa seem reasonable for MA2-1/VT1-0
minor_bugs.impact: Test validation issue, not actual functionality problem

design_issues.issue: Shows 10 rows instead of expected 9 materials - likely includes header or test material

passed_tests: Materials API returns 9 pre-seeded materials including MA2-1 and VT1-0
Calculation API returns 5 models and 241-point stress distribution
Frontend loads successfully with proper navigation
Material dropdowns populate with backend data
Calculate button triggers calculation and displays results
Model comparison bar chart displays correctly
Model results table shows 5 calculation models
Materials page shows table with materials and CRUD buttons
Language toggle switches between EN and UA successfully
Interface zone parameter sliders work properly
